org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot

Class TestRestoreSnapshotHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.TestRestoreSnapshotHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestMobRestoreSnapshotHelper

    public class TestRestoreSnapshotHelper
extends Object
    Test the restore/clone operation from a file-system point of view.

        Execute the restore operation
        Parameters:
        snapshotDir - The snapshot directory to use as "restore source"

        htdClone - The HTableDescriptor of the table to restore/clone.
